file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-11-07-04 - ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT PROTECTIVE DEVICES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT PROTECTIVE DEVICES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the electronic-compartment protective devices. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH sides of the forward electronic compartment, zones 213 and 214. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT PROTEC- ALL 53-11-07-000-801-A TIVE DEVICES - REMOVAL ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT PROTEC- ALL 53-11-07-400-801-A TIVE DEVICES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-11-07 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-11-07-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT PROTECTIVE DEVICES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the electronic-compartment protective devices. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 213 113CZ Forward electronic compartment - LH 214 113CZ Forward electronic compartment - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE LH and RH forward electronic compart- 1 Does the task ment EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-11-07 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING:DO NOT PERMIT ANY PERSON TO GET ACCESS TO THE NLG COMPARTMENT BEFORE YOU DO STEPS (1) THROUGH (3) BELOW. (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, totally relieve the pressure of hydraulic system 1 ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, install the safety pin at the solenoid valve of the nose landing gear door (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Install the safety pin at the nose landing gear ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). (4) Open access door 113CZ AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the clamp (8) that attach the hose (9) to the protective device (3) and loosen them. (2) Remove the bolt (10) and washer (11) that attach the protective device (3) and clamp (12) to the structure. (3) Remove the bolts (1), washers (2), and support (13) that attach the protective device (3) to the structure. (4) Remove the bolt (4), washer (5), support (7), and nut (6) that attach the protective device (3) to the structure. (5) Remove the protective device (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-11-07 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Electronic-Compartment Protective Devices - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONES 213 214 DET. A 6. NUT 5. WASHER STRUCTURE (REF.) 4. BOLT 7. SUPPORT 3. PROTECTIVE STRUCTURE DEVICE (REF.) 1. BOLT (2) 2. WASHER (2) 8. CLAMP 9. HOSE 13. SUPPORT 10. BOLT 11. WASHER STRUCTURE (REF.) 12. CLAMP DET. B (TYPICAL) 145AMM530275.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-11-07 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-11-07-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT PROTECTIVE DEVICES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the electronic-compartment protective devices. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 213 113CZ Forward electronic compartment - LH 214 113CZ Forward electronic compartment - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE LH and RH forward electronic compart- 1 Does the task ment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Position the protective device (3) for installation. (2) Install the bolt (4), washer (5), support (7), and nut (6) to attach the protective device (3) to the structure. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-11-07 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Install the bolts (1), washers (2), and support (13) to attach the protective device (3) to the structure. (4) Install the bolt (10) and washer (11) to attach the protective device (3) and the clamp (12) to the structure. (5) Install the hose (9) with clamp (8) to the protective device (3) and tighten the clamp (8). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access door 113CZ AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. (2) For AIRCRAFT POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, remove the safety pin from the solenoid valve of the nose landing gear door (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200).
